name: MindSetUWP
tagline: NeuroSky MindWave Mobile EEG headset library for Windows Universal Platform (UWP)
body:
### Brainwave activity in your apps - with a blink of an eye.
MindWaveUWP makes your universal Windows apps smarter and helps them to read user brianwave data using Bluetooth EEG sensors. The library is specificaly designed to be very easy, fast and deployable with minimal changes and alterations of your already working code. With only 2  extra lines of code, your application can be ready to recieve and process users brainwave data. The library can not only work with real-time EEG readings, but also provides built-in data recording for long-term data analysis.

### NeuroSky MindWave Mobile headset.
Library is designet for use with Bluetooth equipped MindWave Mobile EEG headsets, that are the culmination of decades of EEG biosensor technology research—all in one easy-to-control, wearable package. As the most affordable brainwave-reading EEG headset available, the MindWave and MindWave Mobile transform science fiction into reality from the comfort of your living room.

### Getting started.
First, create a instance of MindSetConnection.
```
private MindSetConnection MyHeadset = new MindSetConnection()
```
After the MindSetConnection is created, we can directly proceed to connecting to  bluetooth EEG headset.
```
MyHeadset.ConnectBluetooth("MindWave Mobile");
```
Thats it ! We are all set and recieveing data from the headset. From now on , we can access all of the realtime reading directly from our instance od MindSetConnection, just like this :
```
Debug.Write(MyHeadset.RealtimeData.AlphaHigh); 
Debug.Write(MyHeadset.RealtimeData.Beta); 
```

### Going deeper
It does not stop there because MindSetUWP library features much more. To learn all of the possibilities of the library from basic connecting, understanding EEG data to recording, events, emulation and exceptions. You can download the full documentation Here. Or check the included documentation files in GitHub repository.
